trans-unit.source: Represents a security token provider that provides <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.UserNameSecurityToken"></xref> security tokens for a SOAP message sender.
trans-unit.target: Representa um fornecedor de tokens de segurança que fornece <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.UserNameSecurityToken"> </xref> tokens de segurança para um SOAP remetente da mensagem.

trans-unit.source: In most instances the UserNameSecurityTokenProvider class doesn't need to be called directly, as it is called when a client sends a SOAP message that requires a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.UserNameSecurityToken> security token.
trans-unit.target: Na maioria das instâncias a UserNameSecurityTokenProvider classe não tem de ser chamado diretamente, como se chama quando um cliente envia uma mensagem SOAP requer um <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.UserNameSecurityToken>token de segurança.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.UserNameSecurityToken>

trans-unit.source: Specifically, a client specifies the type of security token needed using the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials> class and the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials> class calls the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.GetToken%2A> method to get a security token.
trans-unit.target: Especificamente, o cliente especifica o tipo de segurança token necessários utilizando o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials>classe e o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials>classe chamadas a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.GetToken%2A>método para obter um token de segurança.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.GetToken%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials>

trans-unit.source: When the security token needed is a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.UserNameSecurityToken> security token, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.GetToken%2A> method calls the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UserNameSecurityTokenProvider.GetTokenCore%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Quando o token de segurança necessário é um <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.UserNameSecurityToken>token de segurança, o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.GetToken%2A>chamadas de método de <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UserNameSecurityTokenProvider.GetTokenCore%2A>método.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UserNameSecurityTokenProvider.GetTokenCore%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.GetToken%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.UserNameSecurityToken>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UserNameSecurityTokenProvider"></xref> class using the specified username and password.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UserNameSecurityTokenProvider"> </xref> classe com o nome de utilizador especificado e a palavra-passe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UserNameSecurityTokenProvider.GetTokenCore%2A> method gets a token based on the specified username and password.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UserNameSecurityTokenProvider.GetTokenCore%2A>método obtém um token com base no nome de utilizador especificada e palavra-passe.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UserNameSecurityTokenProvider.GetTokenCore%2A>

trans-unit.source: The username to get <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.UserNameSecurityToken"></xref> security token for.
trans-unit.target: O nome de utilizador para obter <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.UserNameSecurityToken"> </xref> token de segurança para.

trans-unit.source: The password of the user to get a <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.UserNameSecurityToken"></xref> security token for.
trans-unit.target: A palavra-passe do utilizador a obter um <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.UserNameSecurityToken"> </xref> token de segurança para.

trans-unit.source: Gets a security token based on the username and password specified in the constructor.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma segurança token com base no nome de utilizador e palavra-passe especificada no construtor.

trans-unit.source: The GetTokenCore method is called by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials> class when a client sends a SOAP message and an <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.UserNameSecurityToken> security token is needed.
trans-unit.target: O método de GetTokenCore é chamado <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials>classe quando um cliente envia uma mensagem SOAP e o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.UserNameSecurityToken>token de segurança é necessária.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.UserNameSecurityToken> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.GetToken%2A> method calls the GetTokenCore method.
A <xref:System.TimeSpan> that specifies the timeout value for the message that gets the security token.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.TimeSpan>que especifica o valor de tempo limite para a mensagem que obtém o token de segurança.</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"></xref> that represents the security token to get.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"> </xref> que representa o token de segurança a obter.
